Talk_4000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Work_00>Today we're having a surprise test about
the Calamity.
Talk_4001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Work_00>Today we're having a surprise test
about cooking.
Talk_4020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh, I'm sorry! That was incorrect. The
correct answer is the Sheikah!

I'm a Sheikah, and so are the people
working in the research lab up the hill,
as well as those living in Kakariko Village.
Remember that well!
Talk_4022:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Hm, that's an interesting answer. When
you bring ingredients to a cold region,
they do freeze.
They don't turn into treats, but they do
gain a <clr:0000>heat-resisting<clr:ffff> effect when frozen!
Talk_4006:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Angry_01>If I told you in advance, it wouldn't be a
surprise test, now, would it?
Talk_4023:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:SurpriseS_00>That's correct! The answer is an oracle.
Well done, Karin!

Although it took you a moment to recall
that, you should know that nowadays,
your other answers might have been valid!
Stables and newspapers are a rich source
of information, after all.
Talk_4007:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now then, Aster!


Whose technology was used to build
the machines that would oppose
the Calamity?
Talk_4024:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Excellent! Well done, remembering that!


<clr:0000>Monster parts<clr:ffff> can only be used in making
<clr:0000>elixirs<clr:ffff>. Put them in your cooking, and it'll
spoil the food, so be careful.
Talk_4008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now then, Azu!


Who, along with the sacred princess,
stopped the Calamity, and with
which sword?
Talk_4025:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>That's certainly true. Though the specific
answer I was looking for is "cooking
during the blood moon."
Though when the <clr:0000>moon is red<clr:ffff>, monsters
are resurrected, so mind your
surroundings when you cook!
Talk_4009:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now then, Karin!


How did the people of that time come
to know that the imprisoned Calamity
would return?
Talk_4026:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Very well done!


The sword that seals the darkness is
also called the <clr:0000>Master Sword<clr:ffff>. Keep that
in mind!
Talk_4027:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Work_00>Close! The answer is "the Champions."


The Divine Beasts are the machines built
by the Sheikah.

You certainly know a lot! Excellent,
Sefaro!
Talk_5010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseS_00>Professor Link!


Thank you for coming to the Hateno
school once again!
Talk_4028:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Your answers earned you full marks!
I see you've been studying, Sefaro.
Talk_5011:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well then, back to it! I need to
continue prepping.
Talk_3000:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm administering an impromptu test to
the children today.

But I can't decide on whether to test them
on <clr:0000>the Calamity<clr:ffff> or <clr:0000>cooking<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Which would you pick, Professor Link?
Talk_4029:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>These surprise tests will continue for a
while, so please be prepared for
them, everyone!
Talk_5012:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well then, back to it! I need to
continue prepping.
Talk_3001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oho, then that is what we'll do!


I think I'll begin the class soon. If you
don't mind, I'd love it if you could stay
and observe the lesson.
Talk_5013:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>That's the guise of the <clr:0000>ancient hero<clr:ffff>!
Where did you find such clothing?

<sp:3:0:2:0000>Professor Link, you always surprise me!


<sp:3:0:2:0800>The element of surprise is fundamental to
learning as well.

I must devote myself to becoming a
teacher who can surprise and delight
the children.
Talk_5014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, pardon me, Professor Link. That's a
subject you know well, of course.
Talk_5016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Oh dear, I'm sorry. I'm going on about
my own endeavors.

Anyhow, I must say that your appearance
was delightfully astonishing.

And aside from that, I've been meaning to
express my gratitude to you.
Talk_3005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Good morning, Professor Link!


Well? Why don't you listen in on a class
while you wait for the rain to clear?
Talk_5017:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Thank you for making monster curry for
the children!

I'm sure they'll remember it well, since it
was such a hands-on experience.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You know, a teacher's job extends beyond
the classroom.

No matter when or where, if you see
children, you have a responsibility
to them.
Near_4002: Be careful in the rain, kids.
Talk_2003:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ah, good evening. Looks like you caught
me trying to sleep.

You see, I'm administering an impromptu
test tomorrow, and I'm feeling antsy. The
sleep just won't come...
Talk_4011:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now, Sefaro!


What was the title given to the ones
chosen to pilot the ancient machines?
Talk_2004:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Sad_00>I'm administering an impromptu test
tomorrow, and I'm feeling antsy. Sleep
just won't come.
Talk_4013:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>Easy, easy! The champion who wielded
the sword that seals the darkness!<sp:5:1:0> Right?
Talk_4030: <sp:3:0:2:0700>All right, now for the next question!
Talk_4014:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Stables? No wait,<sp:5:0:0> newspapers! <sp:5:0:0>Um...<sp:5:0:0>
I got it! An oracle told them!
Talk_4032:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Sad_00>Class is in session now. If you need to
talk, please do so after we're finished.
Talk_4033:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now then, Aster!


What is the key to making incredible
dishes with stronger effects and longer
duration of those effects?
Talk_4016: <sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionNormal>Ahhh, me? Um, uh... Oh! You add love?
Talk_4034:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well now, Azu!


What happens if you bring ingredients to
a cold region?
Talk_4035:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now then, Karin!


What ingredient is vital in creating
medicine?
Talk_5001:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_00>Ah, please excuse me. Just busying
myself with preparations here.
Talk_4036:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now, Sefaro!


Which ingredient with "monster" in its title
can be used in cooking?
Talk_4019:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>I know that one! It's <clr:0000>monster extract<clr:ffff>!


You mix Hylian rice, Goron spice, and
monster extract to make <clr:0000>monster curry<clr:ffff>!

See? I memorized that one already.
Talk_5002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>These days, it's extra important to teach
children about resourcefulness.

So I've been focusing on teaching
them how to create specific effects
when cooking.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Work_00>Speaking of cooking, <sp:5:0:0>your homemade
curry was a hit with the kids.

Recently I got some Goron spice,
Hylian rice, and monster extract, so
I made them <clr:0000>monster curry<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>But the children say yours is the tastiest
curry, Professor Link!
Talk_5003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, pardon me, Professor Link. That's a
subject you know well, of course.

Well then, back to it! I need to
continue prepping.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Maybe I should pick <clr:0000>cooking<clr:ffff> after all. Hm.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_3011:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm administering an impromptu test to
the children tomorrow.

But I can't decide on whether to test them
on <clr:0000>the Calamity<clr:ffff> or <clr:0000>cooking<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Which would you pick, Professor Link?
Talk_3013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Hello, Professor Link!<sp:0:4:0>You want to observe the class?<sp:0:4:0>That's a shame... Today's lesson ended
a little while ago.
Talk_3014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oho, then that is what we'll do!


I look forward to the test tomorrow. If you
don't mind, I'd love it if you could stay
and observe the lesson.
Talk_5009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>There will be a surprise test tomorrow, so
I need to prepare.

However, I still haven't decided whether
it'll be on <clr:0000>the Calamity<clr:ffff> or <clr:0000>cooking<clr:ffff>.
NakedPlayer_02: It takes all kinds, I guess.
Talk_3015: <sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I'll also need to prepare before I go to bed.<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_3016:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Either.<sp:5:0:0> That might be the least
helpful answer.
